translation.es: EN EL ANTIGUO REINO DE ZAZZAU

translation.en: Kabarkai! Kabarkai!
How come the axe did not split his chest?
translation.es: ¿Por qué el hacha no le partió el pecho?

translation.en: His magic is powerful.
His mother is a priestess.
They call her Zumbura,
the Oracle of Tukur Tukur.
translation.es: Es el oráculo de Tukur Tukur.

translation.en: I will show you.
They say she is the greatest power in all of Zazzau.
translation.es: Dicen que es la más poderosa de todo Zazzau.

translation.en: And she lives alone in the great cave,
translation.es: Y vive sola en una gran cueva,

translation.en: high on the mountain of Tukur Tukur.
translation.es: en lo alto de las montañas de Tukur Tukur.

translation.en: Where's your hero? Here comes mine.
translation.es: ¿Y tu héroe? Aquí viene el mío.

translation.en: Conqueror Kabarkai!
Conqueror Kabarkai! Conqueror Kabarkai!
Dogo, the son of Zumbura Kabarkai!
Conqueror Kabarkai! Conqueror Kabarkai!
translation.es: ¡Campeón Kabarkai! ¡Dogo, el hijo de Zumbura Kabarkai!

translation.en: Baba, who is he?
That young man there
is the prince of Igala.
His uncle rules over the people of their land as regent.
translation.es: Su tío es el regente de esas tierras.

translation.en: That dirty slave is a prince?
This is not a play. It's a competition!
translation.es: Esto no es una obra. ¡Es una competencia! Esto no es una obra. ¡Es una competencia!

translation.en: Show them the difference! This is not a play. It's a competition!
translation.es: Esto no es una obra. ¡Es una competencia! ¡Muéstrale! Esto no es una obra. ¡Es una competencia!

translation.en: Show them the difference! This is not a play. It's a competition!
translation.es: ¡Muéstrale! Esto no es una obra. ¡Es una competencia! ¡Muéstrale! Esto no es una obra. ¡Es una competencia!
¡Muéstrale! Esto no es una obra. ¡Es una competencia!

translation.en: Never!
Kill that man at your own peril.
translation.es: Mata a ese hombre bajo tu responsabilidad.

translation.en: - Take both of them away. - No! This is injustice.
I want my freedom. I want my freedom.
No!
Come back here!
- Aladi Ameh. No! - Danjuma!
- Danjuma! Danjuma! - No!
- Aladi Ameh! - Danjuma!
- - We have been looking for you.
I am Amina.
You will be my friend.
Are you slaves too?
I am Amina.
- What's your name? - Aladi Ameh.
Princesses.
Amina, Zaria, come with me at once.
translation.es: Amina, Zaria, vengan conmigo de inmediato.

translation.en: Sarki says she comes with us.
translation.es: El rey ordenó que la liberaran.

translation.en: No. The sarki should have told me that.
translation.es: No. Eso debería decírmelo el rey, no ustedes.

translation.en: Not you. This is no place for princesses.
Touch me again, and my father will hear how badly you bruised my arm.
translation.es: Tócame otra vez y le diré a mi padre que me lastimaste.

translation.en: - - Princess.
Open this gate.
For the sake of your father's dignity.
translation.es: Por la dignidad de su padre. Si no, por mi cabeza.

translation.en: - If not, for my head. - Free her at once.
translation.es: Por la dignidad de su padre. Si no, por mi cabeza. - Libérenla. - Regresen al palacio.

translation.en: - Come back to the palace. -
Princess, where are you going? Princess, come back.
- Princess, come back here. - Come with me.
Princes Amina. Come with me.
This girl before you is a voluptuous woman.
translation.es: Esta chica que ven es una mujer voluptuosa.

translation.en: - She is blessed with attractive eyes. -
With a pointed nose, slender lips,
and ample bosom.
- And her body is as soft as a cotton wool. -
translation.es: Y su cuerpo es tan suave como el algodón.

translation.en: Greetings to you, O Madaki.
The king acknowledges your greetings.
Sun of Zazzau,
if I may, as a matter of great consequence.
translation.es: si me permite, quisiera hablarle de un tema primordial.

translation.en: Go on, Madaki.
As Madaki,
it is my honor and duty
translation.es: es mi honor y mi deber

translation.en: to guarantee the serenity and the safety of the seven kingdoms.
translation.es: garantizar serenidad y seguridad en los siete reinos.

translation.en: And to do that,
certain difficult decisions must be made.
translation.es: hay que tomar ciertas decisiones difíciles.

translation.en: The immediate execution…
of Igala rebel, Danjuma,
is of highest importance.
One. As an heir to the Igala Kingdom
translation.es: Primero, porque es el heredero del reino de Igala

translation.en: as well as one who vanquished the champion of Zazzau.
translation.es: y, segundo, porque venció al campeón de Zazzau.

translation.en: He has set up an example to other vassals
translation.es: Ha sentado un precedente para otros vasallos.

translation.en: that Zazzau
shall disregard at her future peril.
translation.es: eso podría acarrear consecuencias en el futuro.

translation.en: I agree with Madaki.
Zazzau must meet this threat with the greatest possible response.
translation.es: Zazzau debe enfrentar esta amenaza con una respuesta contundente.

translation.en: I suggest something public.
Extremely--
Greetings, O Princess, Daughter of the Great King.
translation.es: Saludos, princesa, hija del gran rey.

translation.en: - The king acknowledges your presence. - I greet you, Great Heir to Her Father.
translation.es: - El rey la recibe. - La saludo, heredera.

translation.en: May your days be long, Sarki.
You know better than to interrupt Zazzau's supreme council.
translation.es: Sabes que no debes interrumpir el consejo supremo de Zazzau.

translation.en: O Sun of Zazzau, who reigns always in equity.
translation.es: Sol de Zazzau, valedor de la equidad,

translation.en: Yesterday, the prince was denied his right to finish his duel victoriously.
translation.es: ayer, al príncipe se le negó el derecho de terminar su duelo victorioso.

translation.en: And now, he must die dishonorably?
Go back to your chamber.
God has blessed her with a pointed nose.
translation.es: Fue bendecida con una nariz respingada,

translation.en: Blessed with beautiful lips, upright breast. - She is also gap- toothed. -
translation.es: labios hermosos, pechos turgentes y un hueco entre los dientes.

translation.en: Behold the one who embraces the talking drum.
translation.es: Contemplen a quien abraza el tambor.

translation.en: Leave her. Leave her alone.
Leave her alone.
This one I have been instructed to take her to the Madaki.
translation.es: ¡Tengo órdenes de llevarla ante el ministro!

translation.en: Leave her alone. Leave her.
Lack of money is preventing me from buying her.
translation.es: No puedo comprarla porque no tengo el dinero.

translation.en: I'm selling her to you, even though I love her.
translation.es: - La estoy vendiendo aunque la amo. - ¡Alto!

translation.en: Kul!
Baba?
Are you angry with me?
Oh, my angel.
My good angel. Come on, sit, sit, sit.
Oh.  Are you all right?
Yes.
I have one last appeal, Baba.
Your requests never end.
I desire to know how to use weapons like one of your soldiers, Baba.
translation.es: Quiero aprender a usar armas como tus soldados, papá.

translation.en: Weapons, Amina?
But why?
We protect our women in Zazzau.
It has always been this way.
All right.
Musa will teach both of you how to wield a sword.
translation.es: Musa les enseñará a ambas el arte de la espada.

translation.en: I want to be trained by a real soldier, not an old man who limps.
translation.es: Quiero que me entrene un soldado, no un viejo cojo.

translation.en: Well, we can't spare a soldier just to train you.
translation.es: Bueno, no podemos destinar un soldado solo para que las entrene.

translation.en: The Madaki wouldn't like that.
Does the Madaki have any use for the Kabarkai?
translation.es: ¿De qué le sirve Kabarkai al ministro?

translation.en: Is this she?
Don't be afraid.
Ah, a gift from the gods.
For this honor, my friend,
you can have anything you desire in the seven kingdoms of Zazzau
translation.es: puedes pedir lo que quieras de los siete reinos de Zazzau,

translation.en: apart from my chair.
By the way, Madaki,
my daughters are to be trained in all the fighting weapons and skills of Zazzau.
translation.es: mis hijas han de ser entrenadas en las armas y habilidades de Zazzau.

translation.en: The Kabarkai will be their instructor.
Arrange this.
Train in war? Majesty, Princess?
translation.es: ¿Entrenar para la guerra? Su majestad, ¿a princesas?

translation.en: But why?
It is a fancy of Amina's, and I'm disposed to see
translation.es: Es un capricho de Amina, y me interesa ver qué habilidades desarrolla ella.

translation.en: how proficient she, in particular, turns out.
translation.es: y me interesa ver qué habilidades desarrolla ella.

translation.en: O Sun of Zazzau.
May you live forever.
No woman has ever dreamt of joining Zazzau's armies.
translation.es: Ninguna mujer ha soñado siquiera con unirse a los ejércitos de Zazzau.

translation.en: Only the recklessly foolish will dare its actualization.
translation.es: Solo un tonto imprudente se atrevería a tal cosa…

translation.en: Enough, Madaki! Do you question me?
Forgive me, Majesty.
You've spoken magnificently.
Sit.
Eat.
Greetings.
You are no longer part of the army of Zazzau.
translation.es: Ya no eres parte del ejército de Zazzau.

translation.en: What?
This is an elite army.
translation.es: Este es un ejército de élite.

translation.en: Our enemies fear us.
We will not be burdened by a cripple…
even if he is the Kabarkai,
former champion of Zazzau.
The daughters of the sarki requested for you.
translation.es: Las hijas del rey pidieron por ti.

translation.en: You have been assigned to train them to fight like soldiers.
translation.es: Deberás entrenarlas para pelear como soldados.

translation.en: I'll rather go back to my goats on the mountain of Tukur Tukur
translation.es: Prefiero volver con mis cabras en Tukur Tukur

translation.en: than bear this insult from my sarki.
translation.es: que soportar ese insulto de mi rey.

translation.en: Watch your mouth.
The day comes quickly, O Sarki.
translation.es: Qué rápido pasa el tiempo, mi rey.

translation.en: Nothing has changed in 12 years, Priestess.
translation.es: Nada ha cambiado en 12 años, sacerdotisa.

translation.en: My family means more to me than the seven kingdoms themselves.
translation.es: Mi familia significa más para mí que los siete reinos.

translation.en: And I must not bring dishonor to the throne of my fathers.
translation.es: Y no debo deshonrar el trono de mis antepasados.

translation.en: You yourself, unwittingly,
have taken the first step in fulfilling her destiny.
translation.es: has dado el primer paso para cumplir el destino de Amina.

translation.en: Have you been talking to her?
I told you to stay away.
translation.es: Te dije que te mantuvieras lejos.

translation.en: I did stay away.
But now, the time is fast approaching.
translation.es: Pero el momento se está acercando.

translation.en: Purpose itself will drive her to me.
translation.es: El destino la traerá a mí.

translation.en: I will burn all of Hausa land
translation.es: Quemaré las tierras del pueblo de Hausa

translation.en: before I let you touch her, Priestess.
translation.es: antes de que la toques, sacerdotisa.

translation.en: My journey is long,
even for the swift.
One last word to a king who was once wise.
translation.es: Pronunciaré estas últimas palabras al rey que alguna vez fue sabio:

translation.en: Beyond what you see,
translation.es: más allá de lo que ves,

translation.en: clouds of change gather.
None can stop it.
And you will do yourself great harm
if you continue on the path of resistance!
translation.es: si continúas por el camino de la resistencia.

translation.en: You dare threaten me?
I told you no, Amina.
You can't have her.
Her presence will constantly put your life and your sister's at risk.
translation.es: Su presencia pondrá en riesgo tu vida y la de tu hermana.

translation.en: All right.
You may keep her.
But she is never to leave the palace, ever.
translation.es: Pero no debe salir del palacio jamás de los jamases.

translation.en: My father.
May your days be long.
Be strong, Amina! Be strong! Be strong, Amina! Be strong!
Be strong! Be strong! Be strong!
- I won. - You won by a fluke, Princess.
That must be a second fluke. I won yesterday, remember?
translation.es: Debe tener mucha suerte, porque ayer también gané.

translation.en: Sun of Zazzau.
I bring you grave news.
Everything about you these days is grave news, Madaki.
translation.es: Siempre vienes con noticias graves, ministro.

translation.en: Forgive your servant, Majesty.
But this war with the Jukuns makes mine an unenviable task
translation.es: pero esta guerra con los jukun no me deja opción.

translation.en: of dealing with your enemies.
Since when do enemies offer anything but woeful tidings?
translation.es: ¿Desde cuándo los enemigos traen algo más que malas noticias?

translation.en: Spare me the speeches.
How is the war going?
It has lingered far longer than you told me.
translation.es: Está durando mucho más de lo que anticipaste.

translation.en: Yes, Majesty.
But the Jukuns do not fight like men, like fleeting shadows.
translation.es: Es que los jukun no luchan como hombres. Son sombras fugaces.

translation.en: Now they strike, then they melt into the forest.
translation.es: Atacan y luego se esfuman en el bosque.

translation.en: But the Igala regent is on the offensive again.
translation.es: Y ahora el regente de Igala vuelve a la ofensiva.

translation.en: I just received news that he has crossed the border.
translation.es: Acabo de recibir la noticia de que cruzó la frontera.

translation.en: And his army ransacked the province
translation.es: Y su ejército saqueó la provincia

translation.en: with the knowledge that we cannot oppose them.
translation.es: sabiendo que no podemos hacerles frente.

translation.en: What is our strength in the camp outside Zazzau?
translation.es: ¿Cuántos hombres tenemos en el campamento afuera de Zazzau?

translation.en: Less than 10,000 foot soldiers
and 200 cavalry.
That is not enough
translation.es: Eso no alcanza para defender a Zazzau

translation.en: to defend Zazzau if he is insane enough to attack the city.
translation.es: Eso no alcanza para defender a Zazzau en el caso de que este loco decida atacar la ciudad.

translation.en: Recall the army.
Send a strong force to halt Igala's advance.
translation.es: Y envía más tropas para detener el avance de Igala.

translation.en: That means war on two fronts.
translation.es: Eso significa tener dos frentes de batalla.

translation.en: Then call the Jukuns to a table to discuss the terms of a truce.
translation.es: Luego llama a los jukun para discutir los términos de una tregua.

translation.en: My lord, did you ask for Princess Amina's hand in marriage?
translation.es: Mi señor, ¿pidió la mano de la princesa Amina en matrimonio?

translation.en: I'm not good enough for his daughter.
translation.es: El rey no me consideraría suficiente para su hija.

translation.en: Nobody is good enough for his precious daughters.
translation.es: Nadie es suficiente para sus preciadas hijas.

translation.en: Especially Princess Amina.
In his eyes, she will do no wrong.
After all, she's the Queen of Zazzau.
translation.es: Después de todo, es la reina de Zazzau.

translation.en: But in my eyes…
no queen is more royal…
than you.
Don't you forget that.
As soon as…
Zazzau is mine,
you will know who my real consort is.
translation.es: sabrás quién es mi verdadera consorte.

translation.en: So, my lord, what are we going to do now?
Something desperate.
When you get to the palace,
pass word to Kabarkai to see me privately.
translation.es: dile a Kabarkai que deseo verlo en privado.

translation.en: My lord, you cannot trust that man. I have seen him with Amina.
translation.es: Mi señor, ese hombre no es de confiar. Lo vi con Amina.

translation.en: He practically worships her.
There's one thing all men worship,
translation.es: Hay una cosa que todos los hombres adoran

translation.en: and I have them in abundance.
From the best grapes of Tripoli.
translation.es: De las mejores uvas de Trípoli.

translation.en: Enjoy, my friend.
There's many more to come.
translation.es: Hay más de donde viene eso.

translation.en: The daughters of the sarki…
are to have…
a small training accident.
translation.es: un pequeño accidente durante el entrenamiento.

translation.en: Both will perish…
trying to save their beloved instructor.
translation.es: al tratar de salvar a su querido instructor.

translation.en: Only you will survive.
Yes.
For a while, you will be thrown into the dungeon.
translation.es: Pasarás un tiempo en el calabozo.

translation.en: But I will have you spirited away.
translation.es: Pero te sacaré de ahí sin que lo noten.

translation.en: And when I am sarki…
translation.es: Y cuando yo tome el trono,

translation.en: you shall lead all the Zazzau's army.
translation.es: tú liderarás el ejército de Zazzau.

translation.en: So, you finally make your move.
Long overdue, my friend.
♪ Sun, sun come shine ♪
Is he with us, Madaki?
♪ You can have the blood ♪
♪ I will slaughter a ram for you ♪
The Kabarkai said no to you?
- - But he pretends to be drunk.
And depart without his gold.
translation.es: y se va sin su oro. Te daré sangre…

translation.en: Since when will a soldier drink
until he forgot… …a bag of gold?
translation.es: hasta olvidarse una bolsa llena de oro?

translation.en: He flees to the safety of his mother's cave.
translation.es: Huirá a la seguridad de la cueva de su madre.

translation.en: We can get him there.
So, you just make sure that he doesn't return to the palace.
translation.es: Asegúrate de que no regrese al palacio.

translation.en: I'll find another way.
We meet well, Your Highness.
It's been many seasons of rains, my old friend.
translation.es: Han pasado muchas estaciones de lluvia, amigo.

translation.en: Yes.
I'd have wished for more of those peaceful years for you and I.
translation.es: Hubiera deseado más años de paz para usted y para mí.

translation.en: And you have not kept your side of the bargain.
translation.es: No has cumplido tu parte del trato.

translation.en: The boy seems fortified.
translation.es: Parece que el chico creció fuerte.

translation.en: But don't you worry. I've thrown him to the dungeon for many seasons now.
translation.es: Pero no se preocupe, lo lancé al calabozo y pasará muchas estaciones ahí.

translation.en: My friend from the desert,
as long as my nephew is alive,
translation.es: mientras mi sobrino siga con vida,

translation.en: he remains a threat to my throne.
translation.es: continuará siendo una amenaza para mi trono.

translation.en: Send him to us.
I'll send the Ijuma to neutralize the charm.
translation.es: Enviaré a Ijuma para neutralizar el hechizo.

translation.en: But remember, I do not want his blood on my hands.
translation.es: Pero recuerda, no quiero su sangre en mis manos.

translation.en: War with the Jukuns approaches as surely as dawn after night.
translation.es: La guerra contra los jukun se acerca como el amanecer tras la noche.

translation.en: At the moment, I want peace on our border with the Igalas.
translation.es: En este momento, quiero paz en nuestra frontera con los igala.

translation.en: Where is the rebel?
I have sent for him.
For how long have you been… a prisoner of Zazzau?
- Too long, Madaki. - I agree.
And now I have an important undertaking for you.
If you do it well…
your freedom and that of your cousin is guaranteed.
translation.es: tu libertad y la de tu primo están garantizadas.

translation.en: A communication to your uncle, regent of Igala.
translation.es: Hazle llegar este mensaje a tu tío, regente de Igala.

translation.en: There are a lot of caravan bandits here.
translation.es: Hay muchos bandidos por esta zona.

translation.en: Let me have a sword.
Look!
They wear Igala's colors.
It is doubtless a welcome party for their returning prince.
translation.es: Es una fiesta de bienvenida para su príncipe.

translation.en: But how did they know I'm coming?
You… recognize someone?
My father's priest.
Ijuma, the Wise One.
Beware, my prince. Treachery!
- Treachery? - Treachery!
- Soldiers! - Ijuma.
- Ijuma, say something, please! -
Ijuma.
Greetings, O Prince.
Greetings, O Prince.
Outrageous news,
the attack on you, nephew.
My scout will not rest until they seize those springers.
translation.es: Mi explorador no descansará hasta que atrapen a los culpables.

translation.en: And I swear
that by their toes they shall hang,
translation.es: que los colgaremos de los dedos de los pies

translation.en: and I will feed their bodies to the vultures.
translation.es: y alimentaré a los buitres con sus cadáveres.

translation.en: Old Ijuma is dead.
I hear.
Yes, yes, yes.
Tragedy is never far from us.
Igala will mourn him for many days.
translation.es: Igala lo llorará por muchos días.

translation.en: And now, what tidings do you bring us?
I am on an errand from the Madaki.
The war general and emissary of the Sun of Zazzau,
translation.es: general de guerra y emisario del Sol de Zazzau,

translation.en: the Sarki of the Seven Kingdoms.
translation.es: el rey de los siete reinos.

translation.en: Well…
you shall have my reply before your departure.
translation.es: Te entregaré mi respuesta antes de tu partida.

translation.en: But now,
I am sure a hot bath and a very good meal
translation.es: estoy seguro de que un baño caliente y una rica comida

translation.en: is a welcome idea.
And then we shall talk like brothers,
Yes, my lord.
This is a dangerous time for you to return, my son.
translation.es: Es peligroso que regrese en este momento, señor.

translation.en: Your father was a great king.
translation.es: Su padre fue un gran hombre.

translation.en: Yes.
His dying command to Ijuma was to keep you safe.
translation.es: Como última voluntad, le pidió a Ijuma que cuidara de usted.

translation.en: This, Ijuma did with sacrifices to the gods for the last 15 years.
translation.es: Y eso ha hecho Ijuma con sacrificios a los dioses durante los últimos 15 años.

translation.en: Therefore, your uncle could do you no harm.
translation.es: Por lo tanto, su tío no podía hacerle daño.

translation.en: Beware, my prince.
But now, instead, he planned, and Ijuma is dead.
And I don't know
how much longer the protective charm will last.
Therefore, you must flee.
Flee? To where?
I had given up hope of ever seeing you again, my cousin.
translation.es: Había perdido la esperanza de volver a verte, primo.

translation.en: Did you see my mother in Igala?
Will my father soon secure our freedom?
I had no time, Aladi Ameh.
In Igala, I was running for my life itself.
translation.es: En Igala, corría riesgo mi vida.

translation.en: I don't understand.
Where else will we be safe if not Igala land?
translation.es: ¿Dónde más estaremos a salvo sino en Igala?

translation.en: I thought so too.
Your friends are coming.
My cousin, be careful.
War is coming. I have to take my leave now.
translation.es: La guerra está por estallar. Debo irme ahora.

translation.en: We've been looking for you everywhere, Aladi.
translation.es: Te buscamos por todas partes, Aladi.

translation.en: War is coming.
- The soldiers are looking at me strangely. - And who told you that?
translation.es: Los soldados me miran raro. ¿Quién dijo eso?

translation.en: Rekiya says I will be taken back to the slave quarters.
translation.es: Rekiya dice que me llevarán con los esclavos.

translation.en: You are safe with me and Amina. We will protect you.
translation.es: Estás a salvo con nosotras. Te protegeremos.

translation.en: You can't protect me from your father.
translation.es: No pueden protegerme de su padre.

translation.en: He will listen to Madaki.
They will send me back to the slave quarters.
- Nobody trusts me. - Aladi Ameh, we trust you.
translation.es: Nadie confía en mí. Aladi Ameh, confiamos en ti.

translation.en: Prove it.
Everything okay?
The princes of Zazzau are pressuring Baba to give my hand out in marriage.
translation.es: Los príncipes de Zazzau están presionando para pedir mi mano.

translation.en: They are asking for mine also.
translation.es: También piden mi mano. Elegiré a uno cuando esté lista.

translation.en: - I'll choose my prince when I'm ready. - How'd you know when you're ready?
translation.es: También piden mi mano. Elegiré a uno cuando esté lista. ¿Cómo sabrás cuándo estás lista?

translation.en: I will.
Yes. But how?
I've been in love before. With Musa.
translation.es: Ya estuve enamorada antes, de Musa.

translation.en: Musa?
I was ten years old,
and to me, he seemed really gallant in his palace guard uniform and sword.
translation.es: y él me parecía muy guapo con su uniforme de guardia y su espada.

translation.en: Every time I heard his voice, I would run and hide
translation.es: Cada vez que oía su voz, corría a esconderme

translation.en: because I felt like a thousand butterflies were flying in my stomach.
translation.es: porque sentía mil mariposas en la panza.

translation.en: And that is love?
I almost believed you.
- - A thousand butterflies in your stomach?
This is sad.
We are the daughters of the sarki, Sun of the Seven Kingdoms,
translation.es: Somos las hijas del rey, el Sol de los siete reinos,

translation.en: and we do not know the first thing about love.
translation.es: y no sabemos nada de amor.

translation.en: We can hire a teacher.
Man or woman?
Sarki will have a heart attack if we choose any man,
translation.es: A papá le daría algo si eligiéramos a un maestro,

translation.en: even a eunuch, to train us in the skills of love.
translation.es: aun si es un eunuco, para instruirnos en el amor.

translation.en: One thing I know is that
translation.es: Lo que sí sé es que no me casaré con el ministro

translation.en: I would not marry Madaki and become his sixth wife.
translation.es: Lo que sí sé es que no me casaré con el ministro ni seré su sexta esposa.

translation.en: He is almost as old as Baba.
His eyes follow me everywhere I go.
- Hungry hyena. - Ah!
Princesses.
What is it, Musa?
The Kabarkai fled to the hills of Tukur Tukur last night.
translation.es: Anoche Kabarkai huyó a las montañas de Tukur Tukur.

translation.en: Fled? Why?
He was attacked last night outside the city walls.
translation.es: Lo atacaron fuera de los muros de la ciudad.

translation.en: People say by spies working for Aladi Ameh's father.
translation.es: Se rumorea que fueron espías del padre de Aladi Ameh.

translation.en: The guards have taken Aladi Ameh to the slave quarters.
translation.es: Trasladaron a Aladi Ameh a los calabozos.

translation.en: What?
Who gave that order?
It's the Madaki.
The spies were coming for her when they ran into the Kabarkai
translation.es: Los espías venían por ella y se encontraron con Kabarkai.

translation.en: because of the war.
If the Kabarkai runs to his mother,
translation.es: Si Kabarkai corre hacia su madre,

translation.en: obviously he runs from enemies inside Zazzau.
translation.es: es obvio que huye de enemigos que están en Zazzau.

translation.en: Only the Madaki can threaten the Kabarkai.
translation.es: Solo el ministro podría amenazar a Kabarkai.

translation.en: I have a second errand for you, Danjuma.
translation.es: Te tengo un segundo encargo, Danjuma.

translation.en: You will go with two of my men
translation.es: Irás con dos de mis hombres

translation.en: to the cave of Tukur Tukur.
translation.es: a la cueva de Tukur Tukur.

translation.en: There is a man hiding there.
An enemy to both you and I.
I want you to finish what you have started.
translation.es: Quiero que termines lo que empezaste.

translation.en: The Kabarkai?
Get rid of him.
And I'll see that you and Aladi Ameh
translation.es: Y me aseguraré de que tú y Aladi Ameh

translation.en: return to Igala in one piece.
translation.es: regresen a Igala sanos y salvos.

translation.en: Move away.
I said move away now.
Open that door!
Aladi Ameh, are you in here?
- Amina. Amina. - Aladi, where are you?
Princess, please come out.
My princess, please. I beg you. Come out, please.
translation.es: Princesa, por favor. Le ruego que salga.

translation.en: Her father and his people
will never hurt her.
Yes, my people are searching for the spy.
translation.es: Sí, mi gente está buscando al espía.

translation.en: And in the heat of the battle
translation.es: Pero, en el tumulto de la batalla,

translation.en: the girl might be harmed or even killed.
translation.es: podrían lastimar o asesinar a la chica.

translation.en: Get her out of the pit, Madaki.
Perhaps I should keep her closer to me.
translation.es: Tal vez debería tenerla más cerca de mí.

translation.en: No spy will ever know that she is in my place.
translation.es: Ningún espía sabría que estaría en mi casa.

translation.en: What is wrong with you, Madaki?
You have all the young women in the seven kingdoms.
translation.es: Tienes a todas las jóvenes de los siete reinos.

translation.en: Please, leave my daughters and their friends alone.
translation.es: Por favor, deja en paz a mis hijas y a sus amigas.

translation.en: Majesty. I made a mistake.
On my shoulder lies the burden of protecting Zazzau.
translation.es: Tengo sobre mis hombros la carga de proteger a Zazzau.

translation.en: You have only the pleasure of serving me.
translation.es: Solo tienes el placer de servirme.

translation.en: The seven kingdoms are mine,
not yours to protect.
translation.es: No eres tú quien debe protegerlos.

translation.en: My burden and not yours!
Mighty Sun of Zazzau. Sarki of the Seven Kingdoms.
translation.es: Poderoso Sol de Zazzau, rey de los siete reinos,

translation.en: - The Water of the Great Desert. - What is it, Musa?
translation.es: agua del gran desierto. ¿Qué pasa, Musa?

translation.en: The princesses, Sarki.
They have joined Aladi Ameh in the slave dungeon.
translation.es: Se unieron a Aladi Ameh en el calabozo.

translation.en: - What? - I know nothing of this.
- My daughters are in the dungeon… -- I go. …because of your meddling.
translation.es: Mis hijas están en el calabozo por tu intromisión.

translation.en: You fools! Get out!
Run to the dungeon! Kill anyone that tries to stop you.
translation.es: ¡Corran al calabozo! Maten a quien ose detenerlos.

translation.en: Move. Leave. Get out!
Get out!
And you, are you still here?
Your Majesty.
I love my daughters
and I will use all my power
translation.es: y usaré todo el poder a mi alcance

translation.en: to destroy anybody that threatens their lives.
translation.es: para destruir a cualquiera que amenace su vida.

translation.en: Is the sarki still angry with the Madaki?
translation.es: ¿El rey está enojado con el ministro?

translation.en: Why are you so concerned for him?
translation.es: ¿Por qué te preocupas tanto por él?

translation.en: He brought me to you, my lord.
translation.es: Me trajo a usted, mi señor.

translation.en: I only feel gratitude.
I see.
Don't do this, Amina.
It's too risky. Spies are everywhere.
translation.es: Es demasiado arriesgado. Hay espías por todos lados.

translation.en: I am Amina. I fear nobody. My mind is made up.
translation.es: Soy Amina. No le temo a nadie. Ya tomé la decisión.

translation.en: Tell no one about this. Not even Zaria.
translation.es: No le digas a nadie. Ni siquiera a Zaria.

translation.en: This is rash, Amina. Your father will send me back to the dungeon.
translation.es: Esto es imprudente, Amina. Tu padre me enviará de vuelta al calabozo.

translation.en: You are late!
You are late.
You are the priestess.
I met you once as a child.
I am Amina. Princess of Zazzau.
translation.es: Soy Amina, princesa de Zazzau, primogénita del Sol…

translation.en: - First daughter to the Sun-- - I know who you are.
translation.es: Soy Amina, princesa de Zazzau, primogénita del Sol… Sé quién eres.

translation.en: Who do you think has watched over you since you were a child?
translation.es: ¿Quién crees que te ha cuidado desde que eras pequeña?

translation.en: I came to find your son.
translation.es: Vine a buscar a tu hijo.

translation.en: You came to find your destiny.
Come up.
You were expecting me?
You said I am late.
Yes. You are late.
If you had come to me earlier,
the purpose of your destiny will not have been derailed.
translation.es: tu destino no se habría descarrilado.

translation.en: But mere mortals and time
translation.es: Pero los mortales y el tiempo

translation.en: have conspired together to derail your destiny.
translation.es: han conspirado juntos para torcer tu destino.

translation.en: Still,
there is another way.
- Make way. -
May God exalt you, O Heir Apparent.
translation.es: Dios lo tenga en su gloria, heredero.

translation.en: Well?
No words from the mountain yet, my lord,
translation.es: No hay novedades de la montaña, mi señor,

translation.en: but there is other news.
What news?
It's Amina.
Amina?
Finally.
They are here.
Who?
Don't be afraid.
I am Amina. I fear nobody.
translation.es: Soy Amina. No le temo a nadie.

translation.en: Don't you recognize your sister and your old guard?
translation.es: ¿No reconoces a tu hermana y a tu antiguo guardia?

translation.en: - I feel dizzy. - You should not have come.
I couldn't let Musa go alone.
translation.es: No quería que Musa viniera solo.

translation.en: I told Aladi not to tell anyone.
translation.es: Le pedí a Aladi que no dijera nada.

translation.en: Now the sarki will think I left the palace on my own.
translation.es: Ahora el rey pensará que abandoné el palacio.

translation.en: Come with me.
I said come with me.
No.
She stays. Only you come with me.
translation.es: No, ella se queda. Ven tú sola.

translation.en: My sister would have to come with me.
No. Only you.
Come.
I'm not even interested in entering that dark place.
translation.es: Ni siquiera me interesa entrar a ese lugar oscuro.

translation.en: There'll be bats and spiders.
Bats?
Be careful. Call to me if you need help. I'll come.
translation.es: Ten cuidado. Llámame si necesitas ayuda. Iré.

translation.en: Okay.
- Stretch out your hand. -
Listen.
There are hundreds of paths here.
If you get lost here, even I can't find you.
translation.es: Si te pierdes, ni siquiera yo podré encontrarte.

translation.en: Come with me.
I thought the great Amina fears nothing.
translation.es: Creí que la gran Amina no le temía a nada.

translation.en: I am Amina. I fear nobody.
translation.es: Soy Amina. No le temo a nadie.

translation.en: I fear this darkness. It feels like I'm buried alive.
translation.es: Me da miedo esta oscuridad. Me siento enterrada en vida.

translation.en: What is this?
This is the cave of vision.
translation.es: Esta es la cueva de las visiones.

translation.en: This is where Amina's story truly begins.
translation.es: Aquí es donde comienza la historia de Amina.

translation.en: I've seen this before.
In my dark dreams.
That is the woman you must become, Amina.
translation.es: En esa mujer debes convertirte, Amina,

translation.en: If you are to fulfill your dreams for Zazzau.
translation.es: si quieres cumplir tu destino con Zazzau.

translation.en: And these people?
They are dead.
Who are they?
That is the heavy price
you will have to pay to fulfill your destiny.
translation.es: que tendrás que pagar para cumplir tu destino.

translation.en: Now, listen to me very carefully.
You will journey in disguise to Daura
and bring me the blood water from the well of Bayajidda.
translation.es: y me traerás el agua de sangre del pozo de Bayajidda.

translation.en: And if I don't?
Your father will lose the throne of Zazzau,
translation.es: Tu padre perderá el trono de Zazzau,

translation.en: and the entire people of Zazzau will perish.
translation.es: y todo el pueblo de Zazzau perecerá.

translation.en: How do I get to Daura?
I'll take you there.
I journey to Daura.
Daura?
That will take many suns.
- The sarki will miss us. - You are not coming, Zaria.
translation.es: - El rey nos extrañará. - Tú no vendrás, Zaria.

translation.en: It is too dangerous. You will return to the palace with Musa.
translation.es: Es muy peligroso. Regresarás al palacio con Musa.

translation.en: But why, Amina? I can fight.
One of us has to remain in the palace with the sarki.
translation.es: Una de nosotras debe quedarse con el rey.

translation.en: I journey to Daura alone.
Let no one enter the city or leave the city without my permission.
translation.es: Que nadie entre a la ciudad ni salga sin mi permiso.

translation.en: Yes, my lord.
Musa!
Musa!
Princess. Greetings, my princess.
- You're far away from Zazzau's palace. - As are you.
translation.es: - Está lejos del palacio de Zazzau. - Como tú.

translation.en: Apparently, for some time now.
translation.es: Al parecer, desde hace un tiempo.

translation.en: - My name is-- - I know who you are.
You are Aladi Ameh's friend.
- Where is Princess Amina? - What makes you think we're together?
translation.es: - ¿Dónde está la princesa Amina? - ¿Por qué preguntas?

translation.en: Oh, my princess.
Everyone knows that wherever Amina is, Zaria won't be left behind.
translation.es: Todos saben que, donde esté Amina, Zaria va detrás.

translation.en: Perhaps in front this time around.
Kai!
The princess's whereabouts is of no concern to you.
translation.es: El paradero de la princesa no es de tu incumbencia.

translation.en: You have still not told us where you're headed, Danjuma.
translation.es: Aún no has dicho adónde vas, Danjuma.

translation.en: We're on our way to the mountains of Tukur Tukur.
translation.es: Vamos a las montañas de Tukur Tukur.

translation.en: Oh, I see. Hunting the spies that attacked the Kabarkai
translation.es: Ya veo. Andas cazando a los espías que atacaron a Kabarkai

translation.en: or perchance, the Kabarkai himself.
translation.es: o tal vez al mismo Kabarkai.

translation.en: Princess, there are things you know nothing about.
translation.es: Princesa, hay cosas que usted desconoce.

translation.en: Yes, I go in pursuit of the Kabarkai,
translation.es: Sí, voy en busca de Kabarkai,

translation.en: so do others worse than I.
translation.es: pero no soy el único que lo busca.

translation.en: If Amina is with the Kabarkai, then her life is in danger.
translation.es: Si Amina está con Kabarkai, su vida corre peligro.

translation.en: I owe her my life. Where is she? Tell me. Where?
translation.es: Estoy en deuda con ella. ¿Dónde está? Dígame.

translation.en: You must go after them yourself.
translation.es: Tú mismo debes ir a buscarlas.

translation.en: I can't trust mere soldiers with the safety of my children.
translation.es: No puedo confiarle a meros soldados la seguridad de mis hijas.

translation.en: Amina is too headstrong like I am.
translation.es: Amina es tan testaruda como yo.

translation.en: Bring her back to me, Madaki.
Sarki's orders, I obey.
translation.es: Si esas son las órdenes del rey, delas por hecho.

translation.en: Tell me, Danjuma. Why are you here exactly?
translation.es: Dime, Danjuma. ¿Por qué estás aquí exactamente?

translation.en: It's a lengthy tale.
If you still have gold, they will come back.
I suggest that we ride now and swap stories later.
translation.es: Sugiero que cabalguemos ahora y contemos historias luego.

translation.en: This looks like ours.
Send somebody to the merchant of Samunaka.
translation.es: Envía a alguien al mercader de Samunaka.

translation.en: Somebody must have known what happened here last night.
translation.es: Alguien debe saber qué pasó anoche.

translation.en: I hope the princesses are safe.
translation.es: Espero que las princesas estén a salvo.

translation.en: Wayyo!
The first city of my ancestors.
translation.es: La primera ciudad de mis ancestros.

translation.en: We will wait here. I will ride to Daura alone.
translation.es: Esperen aquí. Iré a Daura solo.

translation.en: Why?
To get the city guide who will take us to the well of Bayajidda.
translation.es: Traeré al guía que nos llevará al pozo de Bayajidda.

translation.en: No, Kabarkai. We shall ride together.
Daura is too dangerous for a princess like you.
translation.es: Daura es peligroso para una princesa.

translation.en: I'll be back before sunset.
My princess, we should go back.
I think you've been brainwashed by the priestess.
translation.es: Creo que la sacerdotisa le lavó el cerebro.

translation.en: It looks like a conspiracy.
How?
I remember her prophecy about your future when you were born.
translation.es: Recuerdo que profetizó su futuro cuando usted nació.

translation.en: For the same reason, she was banished by sarki.
translation.es: Por esa razón, el rey la desterró.

translation.en: Now, she has perfected the scheme to get you killed
translation.es: Ahora, ha perfeccionado el plan para que la maten

translation.en: for her son to have a chance of becoming sarki.
translation.es: y que su hijo pueda convertirse en rey.

translation.en: Depart from my presence.
- My princess. - Just leave.
This is love in a strange land.
translation.es: Este es el amor en una tierra foránea.

translation.en: A love not meant to be.
translation.es: Un amor que no debía ser.

translation.en: So distant from mere mortals.
translation.es: Tan distante de los simples mortales.

translation.en: Like the stars, far in the sky.
translation.es: Como las estrellas, que están lejos en el cielo,

translation.en: - So far, removed from the earth. -
translation.es: muy lejanas. Aunque apartadas de la tierra,

translation.en: Yet her rays light up every dark recess.
translation.es: sus rayos iluminan hasta el rincón más oscuro.

translation.en: The hungry eyes can only look,
translation.es: Los ojos hambrientos solo pueden mirar.

translation.en: the thirsty soul can only long,
translation.es: El alma sedienta solo puede anhelar.

translation.en: no matter how much he cries,
the flight to reach is above the sky.
translation.es: el vuelo que debe hacer es inalcanzable.

translation.en: Yet, hope is like a silly child
translation.es: Sin embargo, la esperanza es como un niño tonto

translation.en: always pining for the impossible.
You've always been reckless, but this?
I know.
Why did you do it?
He's the one, Zaria.
And you know this, how?
Each time I set my eyes on him,
a thousand butterflies take a flight in my belly.
translation.es: siento mil mariposas en la panza.

translation.en: You're reckless.
The well of Bayajidda
has not been opened for more than a lifetime.
translation.es: no se abre hace más de una vida.

translation.en: You could've told us this earlier.
I imagined you wanted to see it, not open it.
translation.es: Pensé que quería verlo, no abrirlo.

translation.en: It is sealed for a reason.
- No. This is no ordinary well, my friends. -
translation.es: No. Este no es un pozo común y corriente, amigos.

translation.en: It was not constructed by man
translation.es: No fue construido por el hombre,

translation.en: but came to be by the magic of the great python called Sarki.
translation.es: sino por la magia de la gran pitón llamada Sarki.

translation.en: I will teach you and Princess Amina
about our people and the great Allah that rules over the whole world.
translation.es: Les enseñaré sobre nuestro pueblo y sobre el gran Alá que gobierna el mundo.

translation.en: What is this? Ibrahim.
Blood!
Great evil! We must seal the well immediately.
translation.es: ¡Sangre! ¡Es el mal! Debemos sellar el pozo de inmediato.

translation.en: We have no right to open what has been hidden for so long.
translation.es: No tenemos derecho a abrir lo que lleva oculto tanto tiempo.

translation.en: This is why people lost interest?
I swear on my life,
translation.es: Juro por mi vida que no sabía

translation.en: I didn't know the curse of Sarki still held sway after all these years.
translation.es: que la maldición de Sarki seguía vigente tras tantos años.

translation.en: What is the curse of Sarki?
Once every quarter of a century, in the seasons of the full moon,
translation.es: Una vez cada cuarto de siglo, en las estaciones de luna llena,

translation.en: the well will turn to blood,
and everywhere, the people will drop like flies.
translation.es: y, en todas partes, la gente caerá como moscas.

translation.en: We call it the blood of Bayajidda.
translation.es: Lo llamamos la sangre de Bayajidda.

translation.en: And you, you must give it back to the well.
This is why we are here. We must take this blood to the priestess.
translation.es: A esto vinimos, a buscar sangre para la sacerdotisa.

translation.en: No! No, the--
Amina, move. Danjuma, get Zaria. I will come after you.
translation.es: ¡Amina, vamos! Danjuma, ve por Zaria. Los veo luego.

translation.en: I told them. Even with one eye, you are still the champion of Zazzau.
translation.es: Les dije. Incluso con un ojo, sigues siendo el campeón de Zazzau.

translation.en: I never took you for a fool, Madaki.
translation.es: Nunca te tomé por tonto, ministro.

translation.en: They called me many names,
translation.es: Me han llamado de muchas formas,

translation.en: but never that, my friend.
Yet you threaten the Kabarkai with your arrows and sword.
translation.es: Pero amenazas a Kabarkai con tus flechas y tu espada.

translation.en: Things change, my friend.
The blood on your body…
is it your victim's or yours?
translation.es: ¿es de tu víctima o es tuya?

translation.en: The harlot took your powers away last night, so you bleed.
translation.es: La ramera te quitó tus poderes anoche, por eso ahora sangras.

translation.en: One arrow cannot stop me, Madaki.
And I don't see your guards here to save you.
translation.es: Y no veo a tus guardias aquí para salvarte.

translation.en: I'll snap your neck.
Sleep well, my friend.
Danjuma!
Who sent you?
Who sent you? Speak.
We had him. He would have talked.
It doesn't matter.
The lives of my princesses were threatened.
translation.es: La vida de mis princesas corría riesgo.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
I expected more worthy thanks.
Your father, the sarki, sent me
translation.es: Me envió su padre, el rey,

translation.en: to bring you both back to Zazzau alive.
Where are Musa and Kabarkai?
Kabarkai will join us.
Almost 30,000 soldiers!
Fast approaching.
Who are they?
It's your brother, the regent, and his army.
translation.es: Es su hermano, el regente, y su ejército.

translation.en: Princess, mount on your horse.
You and your sister must ride fast to Zazzau.
translation.es: Ustedes dos deben volver rápido a Zazzau.

translation.en: Thirty thousand soldiers are waiting for you at Gindin Kuka to escort you home.
translation.es: Las esperan 30 000 soldados en Gindin Kuka para escoltarlas.

translation.en: I don't need your soldiers. I can find my way home.
translation.es: No necesito tus soldados. Sé cómo volver al palacio.

translation.en: You.
Release your horse to Zaria.
- I'll ride with the princesses. - Are you sure, Danjuma?
You don't have anything to be afraid of your uncle.
translation.es: No tienes por qué temerle a tu tío.

translation.en: I will ride with the princesses, Madaki.
We will defend you even with our blood.
translation.es: Te defenderemos a capa y espada.

translation.en: We shall be glad if our lives save yours.
translation.es: Será un honor arriesgar nuestra vida para salvar la tuya.

translation.en: We would delay them valiantly.
We try to capture them alive.
If we can't, kill everybody, including Amina.
translation.es: Si no podemos, maten a todos, incluso a Amina.

translation.en: But Princess Zaria must not be touched.
translation.es: Pero no toquen a la princesa Zaria.

translation.en: Not even a single hair from her body must touch the ground.
translation.es: Ni un solo pelo suyo debe tocar el suelo.

translation.en: She belongs to Madaki. Did you hear that?
Yes, sir!
Here they come.
Let's turn back.
- Move! -
Ride on. I will take care of her, Amina.
- - Zaria.
Zaria!
- Zaria!  Zaria. -
Zaria. Zaria.
O Sun of Zazzau.
Wayyo.
Zaria is dead.
What?
Tread on safely, Exalted One!
Tread on safely with your steel gilded shoe, O Mighty One.
translation.es: Camine con cuidado con sus zapatos dorados, oh, poderoso.

translation.en: Tread on safely, Majestic Ruler, the Destroyer of Ill Will,
translation.es: Camine con cuidado, majestuoso gobernante, destructor de la mala voluntad,

translation.en: the Tamer of All Ego and Compeller of Dissenters.
translation.es: domador de todos los egos y opresor de los disidentes.

translation.en: O Sun of Zazzau.
Words have just arrived from the regent.
He's holding the Madaki hostage.
He demands the return of his daughter and Prince Danjuma
translation.es: Exige el regreso de su hija y del príncipe Danjuma

translation.en: in exchange for the Madaki.
I am ashamed to call you my daughter right now.
That boy will return to his people.
translation.es: Ese joven volverá con su gente.

translation.en: Now, we know why he refused to go home.
translation.es: Ahora sabemos por qué se negó a ir a casa.

translation.en: This is the plan to seize the throne of Zazzau.
translation.es: Lo planeó todo para apoderarse del trono de Zazzau.

translation.en: And you have fallen into their trap.
translation.es: Y tú caíste en la trampa.

translation.en: I know one thing, Baba.
Send Danjuma home and prepare to bury two daughters in one week.
translation.es: Si envías a Danjuma a casa, prepárate para enterrarme también.

translation.en: What has come over you, Amina?
Why do you grieve me so?
Is your sister's reckless death not enough blow to me?
translation.es: ¿Acaso la muerte repentina de tu hermana no es suficiente castigo para mí?

translation.en: Zaria will be avenged.
You will never marry that boy.
translation.es: Nunca te casarás con ese joven.

translation.en: On her deathbed…
you swore to my mother,
the love of your life,
that you would never force her daughters into marriage.
translation.es: que nunca nos obligarías a casarnos.

translation.en: Will you still honor that oath, Baba?
I'm now a soldier of Zazzau, Amina.
translation.es: Ahora soy un soldado de Zazzau, Amina.

translation.en: Perhaps, I may help Zazzau defeat my uncle
translation.es: Quizá pueda ayudar a Zazzau a derrotar a mi tío

translation.en: and regain my throne.
Your father will look at me favorably then.
translation.es: Tu padre me mirará con buenos ojos entonces.

translation.en: Your Highness.
I was ordered to prepare 5,000 soldiers for you.
translation.es: Me ordenaron preparar 5000 soldados para usted.

translation.en: Has Danjuma taken over command yet?
Yes, Your Highness.
They wait for you at my command post at Burtali.
translation.es: La están esperando en mi puesto de mando en Burtali.

translation.en: But if I may ask Your Highness, is this war with the Igalas necessary?
translation.es: Si me permite, alteza, ¿es necesaria esta guerra con los igala?

translation.en: They killed my sister.
And you think Danjuma is worthy of being a commander against his own people?
translation.es: ¿Y cree que Danjuma es digno de ser comandante contra su propia gente?

translation.en: I am Amina.
Do not question my judgment.
As you wish, Your Highness.
Greetings, O Prince.
A message from the regent to Amina, Princess of Zazzau,
translation.es: Traigo mensaje del regente para Amina, princesa de Zazzau,

translation.en: Daughter to the Sarki of the Seven Kingdoms.
translation.es: hija del rey de los siete reinos.

translation.en: The regent asks to meet with his nephew one last time before the battle is drawn.
translation.es: El regente pide reunirse con su sobrino una última vez antes de la batalla.

translation.en: Tell my uncle that the only way to avoid war and save the lives of our people
translation.es: Dile que el único modo de evitar la guerra y salvar a nuestra gente

translation.en: is for him to submit to the will of the Sarki of Zazzau.
translation.es: es que se rinda ante el rey de Zazzau.

translation.en: The sarki will decide the way Igala's future lies.
translation.es: El rey decidirá el futuro de Igala.

translation.en: You?
A prince of our people.
You turn against us like this?
You have delivered your message. Return the answer.
translation.es: Ya entregaste el mensaje. Envía la respuesta.

translation.en: Tell your prince I give him two days to respond.
translation.es: Dile a tu príncipe que le doy dos días para responder.

translation.en: Else, I would unleash carnage on his town,
translation.es: De lo contrario, desataré una carnicería en su pueblo,

translation.en: burn down his palace,
and sell off his wives and daughters as slaves.
translation.es: venderé a sus esposas e hijas como esclavas.

translation.en: Let him consider that.
You may leave.
You're late.
It was really difficult trying to leave.
I have to return before I'm missed.
translation.es: Debo regresar antes de que lo noten.

translation.en: What is it?
Mero, this is our last chance.
With the sarki, you will never be queen,
translation.es: Con el rey, nunca serás reina,

translation.en: but with the Madaki, it is very certain.
translation.es: pero con el ministro, es un hecho.

translation.en: Amina is distracted by war right now,
translation.es: Amina está distraída con la guerra.

translation.en: and before she returns, the Madaki will be seated
translation.es: Para cuando regrese, el ministro habrá tomado el trono de Zazzau,

translation.en: on the throne of Zazzau, and you will be his queen.
translation.es: Para cuando regrese, el ministro habrá tomado el trono de Zazzau, y tú serás su reina.

translation.en: He also asked me to tell you that the seven kingdoms of Zazzau
translation.es: También me pidió que te dijera que te dará los siete reinos de Zazzau como regalo de bodas.

translation.en: will be his wedding gift to you.
translation.es: que te dará los siete reinos de Zazzau como regalo de bodas.

translation.en: Calm down.
Calm down, Jakadiya.
It's a matter of time.
Everything will come to pass.
He's the one, Zaria.
You're reckless.
Danjuma! Danjuma!
He died like a hero.
He sacrificed his sword to save my life.
translation.es: Sacrificó su espada para salvar mi vida.

translation.en: I know the person responsible for this, Aladi.
translation.es: Conozco a la persona responsable, Aladi,

translation.en: - And he will pay dearly, rest assured. -
translation.es: y lo pagará caro, te lo aseguro.

translation.en: Your cousin will be avenged.
I loved him, Aladi Ameh.
- You loved him? - Yes, I loved him.
- Just as you loved Zaria… -
just as you loved Musa and Kabarkai.
translation.es: Como amabas a Musa y a Kabarkai.

translation.en: Everybody you love pays for it with their life, Amina.
translation.es: Todos los que amas pagan con su vida, Amina.

translation.en: I weep for you, Amina.
You are now the monster they've always predicted you will become.
translation.es: Eres el monstruo que siempre predijeron que serías.

translation.en: - You dare to mock my grieving? - You took my cousin from me!
translation.es: - ¿Te burlas de mi duelo? - ¡Me quitaste a mi primo!

translation.en: Turned him against his family,
against his brother, and against his people.
translation.es: contra su hermano y contra su gente.

translation.en: Now you returned his dead body to us,
and his name will be branded in our land as a traitor.
translation.es: y, en nuestra tierra, quedará marcado como un traidor.

translation.en: Your ambition will never end, Amina,
until you have consumed every good man in this world.
translation.es: hasta que consumas a cada hombre honesto.

translation.en: You're a monster, Amina!
And before this day is over,
translation.es: Y antes de que termine este día,

translation.en: you will still have much more to grieve about.
translation.es: tendrás mucho más por qué llorar.

translation.en: He has no need for your chains anymore.
Bring my cousin home.
translation.es: Traigan a mi primo a casa.

translation.en: It is done, my king.
Take heart.
Now be strong.
No. Come on.
This is no place for a woman.
translation.es: Este no es lugar para una mujer.

translation.en: Take her away.
Don't worry, Mero.
Zazzau will honor you
for the peace and love you gave to the sarki
translation.es: por la paz y el amor que le diste al rey

translation.en: in his last moment on Earth.
translation.es: en sus últimos momentos en la Tierra.

translation.en: You understand.
He doesn't belong here.
Then why did she let him come back home to us?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿por qué ella lo dejó regresar a casa?

translation.en: He doesn't belong there either.
Why wasn't the messenger from the palace brought to me immediately?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me enviaron un mensajero del palacio?

translation.en: Why?
Someone speak to me.
You.
Speak to me or never speak again.
translation.es: Habla ahora o calla para siempre.

translation.en: - The sarki is dead. - And has been buried.
translation.es: El rey murió y fue enterrado.

translation.en: Madaki has been installed the new sarki.
Nothing! Nothing. Nothing.
This war will have to wait.
We fight another day.
I am going home.
She's going. The princess is going home.
translation.es: Se va. La princesa se va a casa.

translation.en: What happened?
I believe your old friend just heard the bad news.
translation.es: Creo que tu amiga acaba de oír las malas noticias.

translation.en: Which bad news?
That her father
is dead.
The Madaki has installed himself as the Emir of Zazzau and the seven kingdoms.
translation.es: El ministro se proclamó emir de Zazzau y los siete reinos.

translation.en: Oh no.
Amina is finished.
We can now sign a truce with Madaki.
translation.es: Ahora podemos firmar una tregua con el ministro.

translation.en: Finally, Igala land is free from the tyranny
translation.es: Por fin, la tierra de los igala se librará de la tiranía de la casa de los Barkwa.

translation.en: of the house of Barkwa.
translation.es: se librará de la tiranía de la casa de los Barkwa.

translation.en: O Sun of Zazzau.
Princess Amina is on her way with her army.
translation.es: La princesa Amina viene en camino con su ejército.

translation.en: Are you telling us she abandoned her campaign without the permission of this court?
translation.es: ¿Es decir que abandonó su campaña sin el permiso de esta corte?

translation.en: She'll be here before sunset.
No!
Where is Barde?
I say, where is Barde?
He is somewhere close to Burtali with a battalion, Your Majesty.
translation.es: Está cerca de Burtali con un batallón, su majestad.

translation.en: Then you,
depart immediately.
Tell Barde that he should intercept Amina before she reaches the border.
translation.es: Dile a Barde que intercepte a Amina antes de que llegue a la frontera.

translation.en: Get out!
Highness.
Accept the council's condolence over the loss of your father.
translation.es: El consejo envía condolencias por la pérdida de su padre.

translation.en: The death was sudden, unexpected.
translation.es: La muerte fue repentina e inesperada.

translation.en: And as we speak, the kingdom of Zazzau is in deep mourning.
translation.es: Y, mientras hablamos, el reino de Zazzau está de luto.

translation.en: We had no choice but to bury him quickly with full honors.
translation.es: Debimos enterrarlo pronto con todos los honores.

translation.en: The heat did not allow delay.
I get your message…
Yes.
…after you crowned your new sarki?
translation.es: …después de que coronaron al nuevo rey?

translation.en: - It wasn't my decision. - Barde.
Chief warrior of the Sun of Zazzau, whose decision was it?
translation.es: Jefe guerrero del Sol de Zazzau, ¿de quién fue la decisión?

translation.en: I said whose decision was it?
translation.es: Pregunté de quién fue la decisión.

translation.en: No woman has ever sat on the throne of Zazzau,
translation.es: Nunca hubo una mujer en el trono de Zazzau,

translation.en: and you will not be an exception.
translation.es: y usted no será la excepción.

translation.en: But we cannot take it away from you.
It is your inheritance.
The new sarki will accept a union between the two houses by marriage.
translation.es: El nuevo rey acepta que ambas casas se unan mediante un matrimonio.

translation.en: Your son will be the next king after him, Amina.
translation.es: Su hijo será el próximo rey después de él, Amina.

translation.en: And I want to put it to you.
You are not supposed to leave the battlefield,
translation.es: No debía abandonar el campo de batalla,

translation.en: and you did.
That amounts to insubordination.
Tell your men to sheath their swords.
translation.es: Deles la orden de enfundar sus espadas.

translation.en: Brothers cannot fight brothers.
Let us all come together and resolve this issue amicably, peacefully.
translation.es: Resolvamos este asunto en buenos términos.

translation.en: Or is that what you want?
- So be it. -
I say, get out!
Get out!
You, get out. What are you doing here? What are you-- Get out!
Move to the battlefield.
I say get out. Get out!
The priestess, eh?
She gave you bath with the blood of Bayajidda.
translation.es: te bañó con la sangre de Bayajidda.

translation.en: It doesn't matter.
Strike him now!
You didn't tell me it was going to be this bad.
translation.es: No me dijiste que iba a ser tan malo.

translation.en: I did tell you, you were late.
translation.es: Te dije que habías llegado tarde.

translation.en: The throne is meaningless.
translation.es: El trono ya no tiene sentido.

translation.en: Everybody who meant something to me is gone.
translation.es: Todo aquel que significó algo para mí ha muerto.

translation.en: It is what it is.
True, the price is high.
translation.es: Es cierto, el precio es alto,

translation.en: But you must look forward now.
Your people need you.
You have to fulfill your destiny for Zazzau.
translation.es: Tienes que cumplir tu destino con Zazzau.

translation.en: But how?
